mn88:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn88:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthiyam pindaya pavisi.
mn88:2.2: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena pubbaramo migaramatupasado tenupasankami divaviharaya.
mn88:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena raja pasenadi kosalo ekapundarikam nagam abhiruhitva savatthiya niyyati diva divassa.
mn88:3.2: Addasa kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmantam anandam duratova agacchantam.
mn88:4.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo annataram purisam amantesi:
mn88:4.2: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, yenayasma anando tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena ayasmato anandassa pade sirasa vandahi:
mn88:4.3: ‘raja, bhante, pasenadi kosalo ayasmato anandassa pade sirasa vandati’ti;
mn88:4.5: ‘sace kira, bhante, ayasmato anandassa na kinci accayikam karaniyam, agametu kira, bhante, ayasma anando muhuttam anukampam upadaya’”ti.
mn88:5.1: “Evam, deva”ti kho so puriso ranno pasenadissa kosalassa patissutva yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho so puriso ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn88:5.2: “raja, bhante, pasenadi kosalo ayasmato anandassa pade sirasa vandati;
mn88:5.4: ‘sace kira, bhante, ayasmato anandassa na kinci accayikam karaniyam, agametu kira, bhante, ayasma anando muhuttam anukampam upadaya’”ti.
mn88:6.2: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yavatika nagassa bhumi nagena gantva naga paccorohitva pattikova yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn88:6.3: “sace, bhante, ayasmato anandassa na kinci accayikam karaniyam, sadhu, bhante, ayasma anando yena aciravatiya nadiya tiram tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn88:7.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena aciravatiya nadiya tiram tenupasankami; upasankamitva annatarasmim rukkhamule pannatte asane nisidi.
mn88:7.3: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yavatika nagassa bhumi nagena gantva naga paccorohitva pattikova yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn88:8.1: Nisidi kho raja pasenadi kosalo pannatte asane.
mn88:8.2: Nisajja kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn88:8.3: “kim nu kho, bhante ananda, so bhagava tatharupam kayasamacaram samacareyya, yvassa kayasamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi”ti?
mn88:8.4: “Na kho, maharaja, so bhagava tatharupam kayasamacaram samacareyya, yvassa kayasamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:8.5: “Kim pana, bhante ananda, so bhagava tatharupam vacisamacaram …pe…
mn88:8.6: manosamacaram samacareyya, yvassa manosamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi”ti?
mn88:8.7: “Na kho, maharaja, so bhagava tatharupam manosamacaram samacareyya, yvassa manosamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:9.2: Yanhi mayam, bhante, nasakkhimha panhena paripuretum tam, bhante, ayasmata anandena panhassa veyyakaranena paripuritam.
mn88:9.3: Ye te, bhante, bala abyatta ananuvicca apariyogahetva paresam vannam va avannam va bhasanti, na mayam tam sarato paccagacchama;
mn88:9.4: ye pana te, bhante, pandita viyatta medhavino anuvicca pariyogahetva paresam vannam va avannam va bhasanti, mayam tam sarato paccagacchama.
mn88:10.1: Katamo pana, bhante ananda, kayasamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti?
mn88:10.10: “Yo kho, maharaja, kayasamacaro attabyabadhayapi samvattati, parabyabadhayapi samvattati, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati.
mn88:10.11: Tassa akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti;
mn88:10.12: evarupo kho, maharaja, kayasamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:12.4: “Yo kho, maharaja, manosamacaro attabyabadhayapi samvattati, parabyabadhayapi samvattati, ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati.
mn88:12.5: Tassa akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti;
mn88:12.6: evarupo kho, maharaja, manosamacaro oparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:13.1: “Kim nu kho, bhante ananda, so bhagava sabbesamyeva akusalanam dhammanam pahanam vanneti”ti?
mn88:14.1: “Katamo pana, bhante ananda, kayasamacaro anoparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti?
mn88:14.10: “Yo kho, maharaja, kayasamacaro nevattabyabadhayapi samvattati, na parabyabadhayapi samvattati, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati.
mn88:14.11: Tassa akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn88:14.12: Evarupo kho, maharaja, kayasamacaro anoparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:16.6: “Yo kho, maharaja, manosamacaro nevattabyabadhayapi samvattati, na parabyabadhayapi samvattati, na ubhayabyabadhayapi samvattati.
mn88:16.7: Tassa akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti.
mn88:16.8: Evarupo kho, maharaja, manosamacaro anoparambho samanehi brahmanehi vinnuhi”ti.
mn88:17.1: “Kim pana, bhante ananda, so bhagava sabbesamyeva kusalanam dhammanam upasampadam vanneti”ti?
mn88:18.3: Imina ca mayam, bhante, ayasmato anandassa subhasitena attamanabhiraddha.
mn88:18.4: Evam attamanabhiraddha ca mayam, bhante, ayasmato anandassa subhasitena.
mn88:18.5: Sace, bhante, ayasmato anandassa hatthiratanam kappeyya, hatthiratanampi mayam ayasmato anandassa dadeyyama.
mn88:18.6: Sace, bhante, ayasmato anandassa assaratanam kappeyya, assaratanampi mayam ayasmato anandassa dadeyyama.
mn88:18.7: Sace, bhante, ayasmato anandassa gamavaram kappeyya, gamavarampi mayam ayasmato anandassa dadeyyama.
mn88:18.10: Ayam me, bhante, bahitika ranna magadhena ajatasattuna vedehiputtena vatthanaliya pakkhipitva pahita solasasama ayamena, atthasama vittharena.
mn88:18.11: Tam, bhante, ayasma anando patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn88:19.1: “Ayam, bhante, aciravati nadi dittha ayasmata ceva anandena amhehi ca.
mn88:19.2: Yada uparipabbate mahamegho abhippavuttho hoti, athayam aciravati nadi ubhato kulani samvissandanti gacchati;
mn88:19.3: evameva kho, bhante, ayasma anando imaya bahitikaya attano ticivaram karissati.
mn88:19.4: Yam panayasmato anandassa puranam ticivaram tam sabrahmacarihi samvibhajissati.
mn88:19.5: Evayam amhakam dakkhina samvissandanti manne gamissati.
mn88:20.2: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
mn88:20.3: “handa ca dani mayam, bhante ananda, gacchama;
mn88:20.6: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo ayasmato anandassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
mn88:21.1: Atha kho ayasma anando acirapakkantassa ranno pasenadissa kosalassa yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn88:21.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando yavatako ahosi ranna pasenadina kosalena saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
mn88:22.2: “labha, bhikkhave, ranno pasenadissa kosalassa, suladdhalabha, bhikkhave, ranno pasenadissa kosalassa;
mn88:22.3: yam raja pasenadi kosalo labhati anandam dassanaya, labhati payirupasanaya”ti.
mn88:22.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
